name: Infinity Gun - Alpha Demo
description:
You are Agent Double-O Zero, secret agent extraordinaire, sent to foil the plans of the evil Dr. Destructor. You infiltrate his lab with ease, but due to an unfortunate accident involving super glue, your hands are now stuck to one of Dr. Destructor's secret inventions: The "Infinity Gun." Your task is to now exfiltrate the compound, and eliminate all security bots in your way.

Alpha Demo:

  • Please note that this is an early alpha Demo of the project! It currently is very lacking in many features, including sound, level select, etc.
  • At the moment, the demo only has 5 levels, and will move on to the next level once one of them has been won. Note that when the 5th level is won, it will cycle back to the first level.

Objective:

  • You must eliminate all security bots present in each level.
  • To eliminate a security bot, you must either melee attack them (By simply stepping into their space), or shoot them with the Infinity Gun.
  • The Infinity Gun will fire according to a certain pattern displayed along the top of your screen.
  • The pattern will progress each turn. One turn passes each time the player moves or rotates. Note that the security bots also move each turn!
  • If the red box is over a bullet in the pattern, this means that at the end of your next movement, the Agent will shoot a bullet in whichever direction he is facing.

Controls:

  • Q/E - Rotates the Agent Counter-clockwise/Clockwise by 90 degrees.
  • W/A/S/D - Shifts the Agent one space Up/Left/Down/Right.
  • Enemies can be clicked on to view their movement pattern!
